page.title: 17THE TOURIST IN CANNICH AREA
page.content: The road to{Glen Affric,}renowned as a tourist attraction for its all-year- round scenic beauty and its walks, passes through the village of Cannich and{tourism}brings a livelihood to many local residents: the hotel, which is open from Easter until October; the local shop/post office, which is kept busy in summer not just by the casual "day tripper" but by the many who spend their annual holidays in the area in caravans, tents or chalets; the bed and breakfast establishments; the licensed restaurant; the Youth Hostel.{Pony trekking}is available for those who love riding in the hills and salmon{fishing}on the River Glass provides excellent sport for the keen fisher.{Deer stalking}also attracts many visitors and provides work for local inhabitants as ghillies.
